segments.text: I notice a boy climbing precariously on a two-step stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but the instability of the stool makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is he even aware of how close he is to falling?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't take my eyes off him; he looks so intent on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand reaches into the jar, and I can only imagine the thrill of the treat inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him stands there, looking hopeful and excited, almost like a sidekick in this little mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so sneaky, a duo of mischief, and itâ€™s kind of adorable in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR
